text: Potomac Shores station is a future Virginia Railway Express station located in Dumfries, Virginia. The station will serve the Fredericksburg Line and is expected to open in 2022. == History == The station is being built as part of a residential community. It shares the right-of-way with Amtrak's Northeast Regional, Silver Meteor, Silver Star, Palmetto, Auto Train, and Carolinian trains; however, no Amtrak trains are planned to stop here. ==References== == External links == Category:Transportation in Prince William County, Virginia Category:Virginia Railway Express stations Category:Rail infrastructure in Virginia Category:Rail infrastructure in Washington, D.C. Category:Railway stations scheduled to open in 2022
title: Potomac Shores station
